meta_info.name: DV_STATE
meta_info.description: For representing state values which obey a defined state machine, such as a variable  representing the states of an instruction or care process.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The state name. State names are determined by a state/event table defined in archetypes, and coded using openEHR Terminology or local archetype terms, as specified by the archetype.

attributes.name: is_terminal
attributes.description: Indicates whether this state is a terminal state, such as  "aborted",  "completed" etc. from which no further transitions are possible.
